title: varum taruNam iduvE
sahitya:
varum taruNam iduvE aruT-perumAn


anupallavi

  taruNa mazhai pOnra tanip-perum karuNaiyAi


caraNam 1    shuddha sanmArgattil ittalamellAm vAzha 
    caraNam 2    pOr verik-koDumaigaL pUNDuDan ozhindiDa
    caraNam 3    iruT-jAti samayangaL inruDan senriDa
    caraNam 4    ahankAra mAyangaL azhindaruL pozhindiDa
    caraNam 5    asura bhayam vilagi amarAnandam poliya
